description: STRING No. 59 // From 2020-06-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // ‘DAO // FORK’ has been made from the fabric that covers the floor in Jensen’s studio. It is the first painting he has done that is made up of two different smaller canvases. He was experimenting with having motives that do not correlate placed beside each other The title is a mix of DAO - Decentralized autonomous organization and FORK - when a blockchain split in two.
name: DAO // FORK
